SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.distributed.client

Class ConnectionHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.distributed.client.ConnectionHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
RMIConnectionHandler, SocketConnectionHandler
public abstract class ConnectionHandler extends Object
This abstract class is the interface for the connection handler. Multiple implementations can be used. The connection handler helps the client to communicate with the server.

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    final AtomicBoolean
    isConnected
     
    long
    lastKeepAliveTime
    This field is used to check if the next KeepAliveEvent has come after the timeout.
    static long
    MILLISEC_TIME_OUT
    This field represents the maximum span between two KeepAliveEvent, if the time is exceeded the connection is considered lost.
    final UI
    userInterface
    This represents the user interface of the client.

      public abstract boolean sendToMainServer(MainCommand serverCommand)
      This method is used to send a main command to the main server.
      Parameters:
      serverCommand - the command to be sent
      Returns:

    • connect

      public abstract boolean connect(ConnectionCommand connectionCommand)
      This method is used to connect the client to the server.
      Parameters:
      connectionCommand - the command containing the user information.
      Returns:
      true if the connection was successful, false otherwise.

    • reconnect

      public abstract boolean reconnect()
      This method must be called when the client wants to try to reconnect to the server.
      Returns:
      true if the reconnection was successful, false otherwise.
